targets.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT("instanceId")) FROM "worker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT count(DISTINCT("instanceId")) FROM "worker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT  "timeDelta" FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE (("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'done') OR ("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'waiting_on_output')) AND "region"='aws:us-east-1' AND $timeFilter
SELECT  "timeDelta" FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE (("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'done') OR ("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'waiting_on_output')) AND "region"='aws:cn-north-1' AND $timeFilter
SELECT  "timeDelta" FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE (("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'done') OR ("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'waiting_on_output')) AND "region"='aws:ap-southeast-2' AND $timeFilter
SELECT  "timeDelta" FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE (("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'done') OR ("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'waiting_on_output')) AND "region"='aws:eu-central-1' AND $timeFilter
SELECT  "timeDelta" FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE (("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'done') OR ("from" = 'running' AND "to" = 'waiting_on_output')) AND "region"='azure:westus' AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("numCompleted") FROM "longterm"."completed_jobs_by_region" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "region" fill(0)
SELECT count(DISTINCT("jobId")) FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE "to" = 'failed' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "region" fill(0)
SELECT count(DISTINCT("jobId")) FROM "jobStateTransitions" WHERE "to" = 'terminated' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "region" fill(0)

panels.description: The number of jobs switched to onDemand from spot instances

targets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT("jobID")) FROM "spotToOnDemand" WHERE $timeFilter AND "region"='aws:us-east-1' GROUP BY instanceType, time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: AWS US-East Spot To OnDemand

panels.description: Spot jobs preempted by spot market conditions

targets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT("instanceId")) FROM "terminatedSirs" WHERE $timeFilter AND "region"='us-east-1' GROUP BY instanceType, time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: AWS Spot Preemptions

panels.description:
The length of time a job waits after becoming 
assignable to getting a worker

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" !~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'false' GROUP BY region
SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" !~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'true' GROUP BY region

panels.title: Non-Spot Job Assignable Duration

panels.description:
The length of time a job waits after becoming 
assignable to getting a worker

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" =~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'false' GROUP BY region
SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" =~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'true' GROUP BY region

panels.title: Spot Job Assignable Duration

panels.description: The length of time a non-WRD spot job waits after becoming assignable to getting a worker

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" =~ /_s_/ AND "region"='aws:us-east-1' AND "isWRD" = 'false' GROUP BY instanceType

panels.title: US-East Spot Job Assignable Duration By InstType

panels.description: If the restart job daemon is functioning, we expect this to be near 0.

targets.query: SELECT MEAN("numRestartable") FROM "jobRestartDaemon" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)

panels.title: Number of restartable jobs

panels.description: Jobs should transition from idle to runnable quickly.  Sustained periods with many idle jobs could indicate an issue processing new job events.

targets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT("jobId")) FROM "activeJobs" WHERE ("state" = 'idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2m), region fill(0)

panels.title: Idle Jobs
